title: SettleClaimMessage
description: An (unsigned) vls_settleClaim request made by a verifier having verified the claim

from.description: The (Ethereum-style) address of the verifier requesting claim settlement

nonce.description: The nonce (64 bit unsigned integer) of the verifier requesting claim settlement

target_claim_id.description: The id (hex-encoded 256 bit hash) of the claim for which claim settlement is requested
